title: Present Simple Form (with all verbs except 'be')

answers: He goes to school every day.
They sometimes go to the cinema.

parts.value: (he / clean the house at the weekends)

answers: He cleans the house at the weekends.

parts.value: (John and David / often go to restaurants)

answers: John and David often go to restaurants.
